14d62bd8-4f36-429c-96e8-c0977f63c82f.description: Applicants for a Spring Boot Foundational badge should understand how to run a standalone Spring Boot application within a Docker container, how to build REST APIs, and how to generate a basic Spring Boot project structure with a dependency management framework. They should also understand concepts like testing (e.g., the difference between unit, integration, and functional testing), data handling, exception handling, and logging.

06c5b127-12ae-4dc5-a109-021df6baf691.description: CSS Expert badge applicants should understand more advanced layout elements like static/sticky layout, pseudo selectors, pseudo elements, floats, gradient background, and animations. 1242e1d3-f901-45d4-b7c8-86167b3be046.name: Spring Boot Practitioner
